source.c77ecf80:
def displaying_plot(source):
    
    figure = plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))

    Image_List = []
    plt.style.use("dark_background")
    for indexing in source:
        
        Read_IMG = plt.imshow(indexing, animated=True,cmap="hot")
        plt.axis('off')
        Image_List.append([Read_IMG])

    Animation_Func = animation.ArtistAnimation(figure, Image_List, interval=350, repeat_delay=10200)
    
    plt.close()
    
    return Animation_Func
source.75904513:
def show_plot_no_time(x_var,gen_var=str):
    figure = plt.figure(figsize=(12,7))
    plt.plot(x_var[0,:,0],label="latitude",color="white")
    plt.plot(x_var[0,0,:],label="longitude",color="red")

    plt.title(gen_var)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.legend()
    plt.show()
source.314ce6e8:
def show_plot_time(x_var,gen_var):
    list_z = []
    for x_ra in range(len(x_var)):
        figure = plt.figure(figsize=(12,7))
        plt.plot(x_var[x_ra,:,0],label="latitude",color="white")
        plt.plot(x_var[x_ra,0,:],label="longitude",color="red")

        plt.title(gen_var.long_name)
        plt.savefig(f"{x_ra}.jpg")
        plt.close(figure)
        
        NEW_READING_IMG = cv2.cvtColor(cv2.imread(f"{x_ra}.jpg"),cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)
        list_z.append(NEW_READING_IMG)
    print("\033[7;30;43m%s\x1b[0m -- \033[7;30;41m%s\x1b[0m" % (gen_var.long_name,"  -----DONE-----"))
    return list_z
source.12e0a995:
def cal_no_time(x_var,x_gen):
    print("TITLE: \033[0;32m%s\x1b[0m" % (x_gen))
    print("MEAN:  \033[0;32m%s\x1b[0m" % (x_var[0,:,:].mean()))
    print("MAX:   \033[0;32m%s\x1b[0m" % (x_var[0,:,:].max()))
    print("\n")
source.205e7646:
def cal_no_time_spec(x_var,x_gen):
    print("TITLE: \033[0;32m%s\x1b[0m" % (x_gen))
    print("----"*4)
    print("LATITUDE MEAN:  \033[0;32m%s\x1b[0m" % (x_var[0,:,0].mean()))
    print("LONGITUDE MEAN:  \033[0;32m%s\x1b[0m" % (x_var[0,0,:].mean()))
    print("----"*8)
    print("LATITUDE MAX:   \033[0;32m%s\x1b[0m" % (x_var[0,:,0].max()))
    print("LONGITUDE MAX:   \033[0;32m%s\x1b[0m" % (x_var[0,0,:].max()))
    print("\n")

source.e893d88c: The ISC Initiative is an independent scientific society founded to protect our planet and explore the universe. The research methods and software were produced within the scope of the laboratory. The purposes of the ISC Initiative are to contribute to the space science and to analyze climatic disasters. ISCI-Lab was established by International Space Science And Climate Observation Initiative - ISCI.
source.0d52abc2: PATH
source.affd8aef: CLIMATIC EYE OF ISCI was produced by ISCI-Lab in order to stop the climate crisis and to detect natural disasters in real time. CEI-Climatic Eye of ISCI is not just a software tool. At the same time, it proceeds as a network using database and can be integrated into all platforms.
source.49211328: DISPLAY OPTION
source.2494da40:
* SLP Sea-level pressure Pa + 

* PS Surface pressure Pa +

* Temperature of lowest model layer K 

* EVAPOUT Evaporation kg kg-1 s-1 

* QV Specific humidity kg kg-1

* CLDPRS Cloud-top pressure Pa

* CLDTMP Cloud-top temperature K 

* RH Relative humidity 1

* T Air temperature K

* TS Surface skin temperature K 

* U Eastward wind component m s-1

* V Northward wind component m s-1

* U850 Eastward wind at 850 hPa m s-1

* V850 Northward wind at 850 hPa m s-1

* Q850 Specific humidity at 850 hPa kg kg-1

* U10M Eastward wind at 10 m above displacement height m s-1

* U2M Eastward wind at 2 m above the displacement height m s-1

* U50M Eastward wind at 50 m above surface m s-1

* V10M Northward wind at 10 m above the displacement height m s-1

* V2M Northward wind at 2 m above the displacement height m s-1

* V50M Northward wind at 50 m above surface m s-1

* ULML Eastward wind of lowest model layer m s-1

* VLML Northward wind of lowest model layer m s-1

* T10M Temperature at 10 m above the displacement height K

* T2M Temperature at 2 m above the displacement height K

* QV10M Specific humidity at 10 m above the displacement hght kg kg-1

* QV2M Specific humidity at 2 m above the displacement height kg kg-1

* QLML Specific humidity of lowest model layer kg kg-1

* TS Surface skin temperature K

* TROPPV PV based tropopause pressure Pa

* TROPPT T based tropopause pressure Pa

* TROPPB Blended tropopause pressure Pa

* TROPT Tropopause temperature K

* TROPQ Tropopause specific humidity kg kg-1

* TAUX Eastward surface wind stress N m-2

* TAUY Northward surface wind stress N m-2

* TQV Total column water vapor kg m-2
source.b5d1b6f4: PROJECT CUSTOS is a laboratory approach that includes all studies to protect our planet. It includes the analysis and tracking of all possible disasters that will harm our planet.
